title: ADDITIONAL CONNECTIONS TO THE PRE-ASSEMBLED INTEGRATED BESS
fullText: Some systems have the ability to have additional generation ports and other devices (e.g. PV arrays, generators, etc.) connected. Installation of additional energy sources shall be installed in accordance with AS/NZS 3000:2018 Section 7. Where the energy source is a PV array, the installation shall meet the requirements of AS/NZS 5033.
